root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows® XP (with Service Pack 2 or higher)Processor: Intel Core® 2 2 GHz or higherMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: NVidia GeForce 8600 GT 256MBDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceSound: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
